title: 이달의소녀탐구 #218 (LOONA TV #218)
summary:
Choerry films her individual portion of the Sweet Crazy Love MV
0:17 -- Choerry playfully hides behind a pillar
0:42 -- Choerry talks about how she had to dance while walking for shooting the MV
0:53 -- JinSoul promises more Legolas hair: “Coming soon!” in English.
